feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r GPL(GPL) :g [1,1] : MainGpl(MainGpl) :m HiddenGtp(HiddenGtp) :g [1,1] : DirectedWithEdges(DirectedWithEdges) : DirectedWithNeighbors(DirectedWithNeighbors) : DirectedOnlyVertices(DirectedOnlyVertices) : UndirectedWithEdges(UndirectedWithEdges) : UndirectedWithNeighbors(UndirectedWithNeighbors) : UndirectedOnlyVertices(UndirectedOnlyVertices) :m TestProg(TestProg) :m Alg(Alg) :g [1,*] : Number(Number) : Connected(Connected) : StrongC(StrongC) :m StronglyConnected(StronglyConnected) :m Transpose(Transpose) : Cycle(Cycle) : MSTPrim(MSTPrim) : MSTKruskal(MSTKruskal) :m Src(Src) :g [1,1] : BFS(BFS) : DFS(DFS) :m HiddenWgt(HiddenWgt) :m WeightOptions(WeightOptions) :o WeightedWithEdges(WeightedWithEdges) :o WeightedWithNeighbors(WeightedWithNeighbors) :o WeightedOnlyVertices(WeightedOnlyVertices) :m Wgt(Wgt) :g [1,1] : Weighted(Weighted) : Unweighted(Unweighted) :m Gtp(Gtp) :g [1,1] : Directed(Directed) : Undirected(Undirected) :m Implementation(Implementation) :g [1,1] : OnlyVertices(OnlyVertices) : WithNeighbors(WithNeighbors) : WithEdges(WithEdges) :m Base(Base)
feature_model.constraints: C1:~Number or Gtp C2:~Number or Src C3:~Connected or Undirected C4:~Connected or Src C5:~StrongC or Directed C6:~StrongC or DFS C7:~Cycle or Gtp C8:~Cycle or DFS C9:~MSTKruskal or Undirected C10:~MSTKruskal or Weighted C11:~MSTPrim or Undirected C12:~MSTPrim or Weighted C13:~MSTKruskal or ~MSTKruskal or ~MSTPrim C14:~MSTKruskal or WithEdges
